Component.description: Metadata about components of nutritional interest measured from foods.

analytical_analysis_measurement_method.description: A controlled vocabulary term denoting method used to conduct an analytical analysis on a sample, (e.g., HPLC).

analytical_analysis_measurement_protocol.description: A string denoting a digital object identifier link to a measurement protocol used to conduct an analytical analysis on a sample.

component_analysis_date.description: A datetime value representing the date in which a component of nutritional interest was analyzed.

component_comment.description: A comment relating to an analyzed component of nutritional interest.

component_data_points_number.description: An integer representing the number of individual samples that comprise a component sample. 1 if an individual sample >1 if an aggregation of samples.

component_derivation_type.description: A controlled vocabulary term denoting how a component of nutritional interest was generated, (e.g., Analytical or Calculated).

component_limit_of_quantitation.description: A string representing the lowest analyte concentration likely to be reliably distinguished from the Limit of Blank (LoB) and at which detection is feasible during the analysis of a component of nutritional interest.

component_measurement_unit.description: A unit code representing the unit of measurement in which a component_recorded_value is measured.

component_quality_control_remeasurement.description: A boolean value denoting TRUE if a component_recorded_value was measured more than once for internal laboratory quality control purposes.

component_record_date.description: A datetime value representing recorded date pertaining to an analyzed sample.

component_recorded_value.description: A float representing a recorded value of a component of nutritional interest measured from a laboratory sample derived from a food sample.

component_type.description: A controlled vocabulary term representing the type of component of nutritional interest analyzed from a food sample.

component_type_label.description: A string denoting the label of a controlled vocabulary term representing an analyzed component_type from a food sample.

laboratory_conducting_analytical_analysi.description: A string denoting the name of a laboratory that conducted the analytical analysis of a measured_compound.

laboratory_sample_aggregation_maximum_me.description: A float representing the maximum measured compound value of an aggregation of samples.

laboratory_sample_aggregation_measured_c.description: A float representing the standard deviation of a measured compound value of an aggregation of samples.

laboratory_sample_aggregation_median_mea.description: A float representing the median measured compound value of an aggregation of samples.

laboratory_sample_aggregation_minimum_me.description: A float representing the minimum measured compound value of an aggregation of samples.

laboratory_sample_aliquot_id.description: A string denoting an identifier of a unique aliquot of a laboratory sample which was prepared from a food sample.

laboratory_sample_batch_id.description: A string denoting an identifier of a batch of laboratory samples analysed together.

laboratory_sample_id.description: A string denoting an identifier of a laboratory sample which was prepared from a food sample.

Component.title: Component

Food.description: Metadata about foods analyzed for components of nutritional interest.

food_acquisition_agent_name.description: A string denoting the name of the agent (person, device or other type of service) that acquired the food sample.

food_acquisition_city.description: A string denoting the city in which a food sample was acquired.

food_acquisition_country.description: A string denoting the country code from which a food sample was acquired.

food_acquisition_country_subdivision.description: A string denoting the country subdivision from which a food sample was acquired (e.g., state or province).

food_acquisition_date.description: A datetime value representing the date a food sample was acquired.

food_acquisition_latitude.description: A float representing the latitude of the place from which the food sample was acquired.

food_acquisition_location_type.description: A string describing the type of location from which a food sample was acquired (e.g., a supermarket).

food_acquisition_longitude.description: A float representing the longitude of the place from which the food sample was acquired.

food_acquisition_organization.description: A string denoting the name of the organization responsible for acquired the food sample.

food_additional_types.description: A list of controlled vocabulary denoting the label(s) of additional food types, not including the food_primary_type that are in a food sample.

food_category_label.description: A string or controlled vocabulary denoting the label of the food group or category of the primary food material.

food_cooking_method.description: An enumerated set of controlled vocabulary terms representing the any cooking method(s) applied to a food sample prior to analysis (e.g., "baked").

food_distributor_city.description: A string denoting the city of a distributor organization from which a food sample was acquired.

food_distributor_country.description: A string denoting the country code of a distributor organization from which a food sample was acquired.

food_distributor_country_subdivision.description: A string denoting the country subdivision of a distributor organization from which a food sample was acquired, (e.g., state or province).

food_expiration_date.description: A datetime value representing the food expiration data as shown on the labeling information of the food sample.

food_preservation_state.description: An enumerated set of controlled vocabulary terms representing the preservation state(s) of a food sample (e.g., "raw").

food_primary_type.description: A controlled vocabulary term representing the primary food material which was sampled.

food_primary_type_label.description: A string denoting the label of a controlled vocabulary term representing the primary food material which was sampled.

food_ripeness_state.description: An enumerated set of controlled vocabulary terms representing the qualitative freshness state of a food sample when prepared for analysis.

food_storage_temperature_state.description: An enumerated set of controlled vocabulary terms representing the qualitative temperature state at which a food sample was stored prior to acquisition (e.g., "Refrigerated").

food_upc_code.description: An integer denoting a Universal Product Code (UPC) barcode of a food sample.

laboratory_sample_aliquot_id.description: A string denoting an identifier of a unique aliquot of a laboratory sample which was prepared from a food sample.

laboratory_sample_batch_id.description: A string denoting an identifier of a batch of laboratory samples analysed together.

laboratory_sample_id.description: A string denoting an identifier of a laboratory sample which was prepared from a food sample.

Food.title: Food

Provenance.description: Supplemental data about the provenance of a Food and Component dataset collection standardized using MIFC.

contributor_orcid.description: A string corresponding to a "|" delimited list of ORCIDs of people who contributed to a MIFC formatted dataset. See https://orcid.org/.

dataset_label.description: A string corresponding to the labeled name of dataset (e.g., "Standard Reference (SR) Legacy").

laboratory_sample_aliquot_id.description: A string denoting an identifier of a unique aliquot of a laboratory sample which was prepared from a food sample.

laboratory_sample_batch_id.description: A string denoting an identifier of a batch of laboratory samples analysed together.

laboratory_sample_id.description: A string denoting an identifier of a laboratory sample which was prepared from a food sample.

mifc_version_tag.description: A string corresponding to a named MIFC release number (e.g., "v1.0.1").

organization_name.description: A string corresponding to a "|" delimited list of organizations who created or help to create to a MIFC formatted dataset. E.g., "USDA".

Provenance.title: Provenance
